mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna_reply ( created_at, modified_at, is_delete, comment, user_id, qna_comment_id) VALUES ( now(), now(), false, #{comment}, #{userId}, #{qnaCommentId})
mapper.select: SELECT qna_reply_id, created_at, modified_at, is_delete, comment, user_id, qna_comment_id FROM qna_reply WHERE qna_reply_id = #{qnaReplyId} ORDER BY created_at ASC, qna_reply_id ASC
